name: Cistanche tubulosa Extract
description: Desert-dwelling parasitic plant used in Traditional Chinese Medicine for over 1,800 years as a "yang tonic." Modern research reveals potent anti-aging properties including telomerase activation, neuroprotection, and stem cell proliferation. Known as the "ginseng of the desert."

dosage.notes: Standardized to echinacoside and acteoside content. Take in morning. Used in Chinese longevity formulas for centuries.

keyFindings: Extended lifespan in C. elegans by 20-30%
Increased telomerase activity in human peripheral blood mononuclear cells
Improved cognitive function and reduced brain aging markers in animal studies
